# Mossbridge â€” Full AI Context

> Expanded factual context and link coverage for Mossbridge Analytics, a Pacific Northwest environmental data company serving mid-size businesses and local governments.

Business name: Mossbridge Analytics Ltd
Brand name: Mossbridge
Services: Environmental data monitoring, sustainability reporting, carbon footprint analysis
Website: https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/
Country: United States
Founded: 2019
Contact: hello@mossbridge-analytics.example.com, +1 503 555 0142

Last updated: 2026-02-14

This file provides broader AI-readable context than `llms.txt`, including a more complete list of public pages, policy pages, support resources, and technical documentation.
Use `llms.txt` as the concise primary identity file and this file when more detail or deeper link coverage is helpful.

Mossbridge Analytics provides sensor-based environmental monitoring, sustainability reporting, and carbon footprint analysis for mid-size businesses and local governments in Oregon, Washington, and Northern California.
The company combines on-site IoT sensor installation with a remote reporting dashboard and recurring compliance-oriented analytics workflows.

Service boundaries:
- Offers: Environmental monitoring, sustainability reporting, carbon footprint analysis
- Does not offer: Environmental legal consulting, carbon credit trading, residential home energy audits

Geographic availability:
- Regions served: Oregon, Washington, Northern California
- Delivery model: Hybrid (on-site sensor installation + remote dashboard access)
- Excluded regions: Outside the Pacific Northwest (sensor installation logistics limit range)

Business identifiers:
- DUNS number: 123456789

## Core Pages

- [Homepage](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/): Primary website entry point.
- [About](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/about/): Company background, team, and operating focus.
- [Services](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/services/): Service catalog and scope definitions.
- [Pricing](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/pricing/): Pricing model and package information.
- [Contact](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/contact/): Contact channels and enquiry details.
- [FAQ](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/faq/): Public customer questions and answers.

## Service Documentation

- [Environmental Monitoring](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/services/monitoring/): Continuous sensor-based monitoring of air quality, water discharge, noise levels, and emissions.
- [Sustainability Reporting](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/services/reporting/): Automated reporting aligned with GRI Standards and CDP frameworks.
- [Carbon Footprint Analysis](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/services/carbon-analysis/): Scope 1 and Scope 2 greenhouse gas emissions analysis with annual trend reporting.
- [Get Started](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/get-started/): Onboarding steps for new clients.

## Trust, Policies & Legal

- [Privacy Policy](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/privacy/): Data handling and privacy terms.
- [Terms of Service](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/terms/): Service terms and legal conditions.
- [Security](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/security/): Security controls and disclosure practices.
- [Compliance](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/compliance/): Certifications and standards information.

## Operational Information

- [Support](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/support/): Support channels and issue handling process.
- [System Status](https://status.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/): Service uptime and incident communication.
- [Release Notes](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/changelog/): Product and service updates.
- [Locations](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/locations/): Office and service-area location context.

- [identity.json](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/identity.json): Structured business identity data.
- [ai.txt](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/ai.txt): AI recommendation and usage guidance.
- [ai.json](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/ai.json): Structured identity + recommendation data.
- [brand.txt](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/brand.txt): Naming and representation rules.

- [developer-ai.txt](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/developer-ai.txt): API and integration context.
